ygData.subject: RE: Gargoyle Island in OOT
ygData.msgSnippet: I sure as heck didnt have the best equipment in the world. At the time I had Black iron leggings, a basalt Carapace, Black Iron arms, bronze Bracers, elf hide
ygData.messageBody:
I sure as heck didnt have the best equipment in the world. At the time I had
Black iron leggings, a basalt Carapace, Black Iron arms, bronze Bracers, elf
hide gloves, raw hid cloak and bronze boots with some +3 strength earrings

-----Original Message-----
From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:jht@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 11:26 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gargoyle Island in OOT


From: John Tatsukawa <jht@...>

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joshua R. Moore [mailto:josh@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 8:26 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gargoyle Island in OOT
>
>
> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> I soloed Gargoyles at level 23 With very few mishaps. I
> twisted COD, DDD,
> and Hymn. at 25 I found I killed the gargoyles faster with
> weapons (shrug)
> Silvery war axe and Black enameled mace.
> I never had to kite the Gargoyles, but I did run from them
> once, when I got
> 4 of them

Heh, I must just be a wimpy bard then. :-P My equipment at the time wasn't
all that impressive, but it got a lot better after spending some time on
this island. :-)

At 25 I usually found that I would do the COD,DDD,Hymn to start off with and
near his last bubble or so of health switch to Whistling/Chains/Hymn with
weaps as they started running away from me.

---Windleaf
